meanings.definition: Not producing or releasing an egg during the menstrual cycle.
meanings.sent1: The anovular woman did not ovulate this month.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that anovular cycles are common in some women.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her anovular tendencies were saving her money on pregnancy tests.
meanings.sent4: The garden, anovular in its barrenness, awaited the arrival of spring.
meanings.sent5: The anovular condition made her fertility struggles even more challenging.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of anovulation.
meanings.sent1: The anovular symptoms were concerning to the doctor.
meanings.sent2: Her hormonal imbalance led to anovular issues.
meanings.sent3: The anovular test results left her feeling puzzled.
meanings.sent4: The anovular clouds in the sky signaled a storm was approaching.
meanings.sent5: The anovular nature of her cycle required medical intervention.
